value.title: Retro Game Translation with Azure Cognitive Services and IoT Edge | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Paul DeCarlo shows Scott Hanselman how Azure IoT Edge enables you to deploy cloud intelligence locally on edge devices.  By moving certain workloads to the edge of your network, your devices spend less time communicating with the cloud, can react more quickly to local changes, and operate reliably even

value.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing
value.excerpt: Explore the core concepts and benefits of cloud computing as you learn how to choose a cloud deployment model customized for your organization.

value.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
value.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

value.title: Autoscale applications on Kubernetes with Kubernetes Event-Driven Autoscaling (KEDA) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Do you want to scale your workloads on Kubernetes without having to worry about the details? Do you want to run Azure Functions anywhere and easily scale it yourself? Tom Kerkhove shows Scott Hanselman how Kubernetes Event-Driven Autoscaling (KEDA) makes application autoscaling dead simple.  0:00 – Introduction

value.title: Azure Portal “How To” Series
value.excerpt: Welcome to our weekly series that highlights specific aspects of the Azure portal so you can be more efficient and productive while deploying your cloud workloads from the portal.

topItems.title: How to get started with Azure Arc | Azure Portal Series
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How-to” series, learn how to get started with Azure Arc offerings in the Microsoft Azure portal. You will learn what Azure Arc is and how to easily add, view, and manage your hybrid, edge, or multi-cloud resources from Azure.     Try out these features in the Azure

topItems.title: How to get started with Azure Cosmos DB built-in notebooks | Azure Portal Series
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How-to” series, learn how to use Microsoft Azure Cosmos DB’s built-in C# and Python notebooks. We’ll show how to get started, use notebooks to visualize and analyze your data, and share your notebooks with others.     Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com

topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How-to” series, learn how to easily find an image for your virtual machine with Microsoft Azure. topItems.title: How to find the right load balancing service | Azure Portal Series
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to use the new Microsoft Azure ‘Load balancing- help me choose’ service to find the right load balancing service for your scenario. value.title: Describe core Azure architectural components
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure subscriptions, management groups, resource groups, Azure Resource Manager, Azure regions, and availability zones.

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 2: Describe core Azure services
value.excerpt: This learning path provides you with an introduction to the basics of Azure's core services for compute, network, storage, and database.

topItems.title: Explore Azure database and analytics services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the database services that are available on Microsoft Azure, such as Azure Cosmos DB, Azure SQL, Azure Database for MySQL, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, as well as big data and analytics.

topItems.title: Explore Azure compute services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the different services that are available in Azure Compute.

topItems.title: Explore Azure Storage services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the different storage options that are available in Azure Storage.

topItems.title: Explore Azure networking services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the core networking resources that are available in Azure, such as Virtual Networks, VPN Gateway, and ExpressRoute.

value.title: Azure fundamentals
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of Azure cloud computing.

topItems.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing
topItems.excerpt: Explore the core concepts and benefits of cloud computing as you learn how to choose a cloud deployment model customized for your organization.

topItems.title: Create an Azure account
topItems.excerpt: Find out how to start using Azure by creating an account where you’ll see services and personal settings for identity, billing, and preferences.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Introduction to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Create your first virtual machine as you discover the power of Azure cloud computing and storage, along with services that help you explore new software paradigms.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Azure global network of physical datacenters, the physical architecture of Azure, how redundancy is provided, and Microsoft service guarantees.

value.title: Explore Azure database and analytics services
value.excerpt: Learn about the database services that are available on Microsoft Azure, such as Azure Cosmos DB, Azure SQL, Azure Database for MySQL, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, as well as big data and analytics.

value.title: How to get started with Azure Cosmos DB built-in notebooks | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How-to” series, learn how to use Microsoft Azure Cosmos DB’s built-in C# and Python notebooks. We’ll show how to get started, use notebooks to visualize and analyze your data, and share your notebooks with others.     Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com

topItems.title: Choose the best tools to help organizations build better solutions
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft tools and services that help developers and operations engineers build modern solutions for the cloud and on-premises.

topItems.title: Choose the best monitoring service for visibility, insight, and mitigation of service outages
topItems.excerpt: Discover solutions that help IT organizations with insights into the health and performance of their applications running in the cloud.

topItems.title: Choose the best tools for managing and configuring your Azure environment
topItems.excerpt: Explore the Azure management, administration, and reporting tools, and choose the ones that best meet your organization's needs.

value.excerpt: Learn how to secure resources using policy, role-based access control, and other Azure services

topItems.title: Protect against security threats on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure can help you protect the workloads that you run both in the cloud and in your on-premises datacenter.

topItems.title: Build a cloud governance strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to access policies, resource locks, and tags, as well as how Azure services such as Azure Policy and Azure Blueprints can help you build a comprehensive cloud governance strategy.

topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure’s role-based access control to effectively manage your team’s access to Azure resources.

value.title: Get started with artificial intelligence on Azure
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) empowers amazing new solutions and experiences; and Microsoft Azure provides easy to use services to help you get started.

topItems.title: Get started with AI on Azure
topItems.excerpt: With AI, we can build solutions that seemed like science fiction a short time ago; enabling incredible advances in health care, financial management, environmental protection, and other areas to make a better world for everyone.
